reviews.review: Portal is one of the best puzzle games I have played; it really gets you thinking, and the voice you hear guiding you around the complex is hilarious! Love this game 10/10
where's that last god damn security camera
Проходится быстро, но зато игра хорошая и качественная.

Portal is a wonderful puzzle platformer. I got the Orange Box years and years ago and will never forget the wonder of playing Portal for the first time. Now years later (maybe even decades, yikes) I've picked up Portal and Half Life once more and I'm enjoying them as much as the first time. It's hard to give a proper review because I've never met anyone who didn't enjoy this game. It's fun, challenging (but not too challenging) and its sequel takes everything that was great in the first game and adds even more dimension to a subtly interesting story. I couldn't possibly rave more about this game than I already do.

10/10

Dope old game.  Rather short but well worth the time it takes to finish.  Really funny and fun to play.
Shorter than I thought, but an absolute essential.

I think that overall, Portal is a pretty good game. It managed to do a lot with relatively little. It's an unique, charming, funny, and enjoyable gaming experience. It is a short game, which would be sad if it didn't have multiple achievements and the decisions that the player makes in the game. The only real compliant that I have about this game is that some of the puzzles rely more on you having precision rather than you knowing how to complete it, which can be annoying at times.

9/10
I love the story behind this game... I'm in love....
I can put my supreme intellect to the test.

There's good reason why the portal franchise is popular. Gameplay-wise there's a good amount of interesting physics and portal based puzzles that are neither too hard nor too easy. Narrative-wise, there's a good amount of interesting one-way dialog between the antagonist and you. The final boss battle is very entertaining and quirky. A well worth play but I recommend you get it on sale

这着实是一款具有开创性的解谜游戏，丰富的想象力，是通关的必要条件，我的库里因有传送门系列而骄傲~当然二代更欢乐，因为可以联机，一代相对来说纯解谜的性质更多，通俗地说就是更难一些，但值得购买！

Cake:

    8 eggs
    2 1/4 cups brown sugar
    1 3/4 cups milk
    1 1/4 cups vegetable oil
    1 tablespoon vanilla extract
    2 3/4 cups all-purpose flour
    1/2 cup unsweetened cocoa powder
    1 teaspoon baking soda
    2 teaspoons baking powder
    1/4 teaspoon salt

Cherry filling:

    1 1/2 lbs fresh black cherries (frozen or canned work if not in season)
    1/2 cup kirsch liqueur
    1/2 cup sugar
    1/4 cup cold water
    1 tablespoon cornstarch (dissolved in 1 tablespoon of water)

Whipped cream:

    4 cups heavy cream
    2 tablespoons gelatin powder
    1/2 cup sugar
    3 tablespoons kirsch liqueur
    2 tablespoons vanilla extract
    4 ounces good quality dark chocolate

Es un juegazo! tiene unas mecánicas muy originales. La dificultad va subiendo progresivamente, aunque no es paricularmente difícil. Lo complicado en general es darse cuenta qué tenés que hacer para pasar al siguiente lugar o resolver los problemas, y puede que cueste un poco al principio familiarizarse con las mecánicas. 
Los efectos de sonido y la música como ruido ambiente, le dan también un aire especial. Y otra mención especial para los diálogos (o debería decir monólogos), y también a la voz de las torretas, que tratan de matarte pero hablan de manera adorable.
I loooove portal. Great portal game. Fun portal

The game is PERFECT. The lore is good, the story is good, the game is good. The levels are ( some ) kinda hard, but they are pretty fun. And the boss fight is magnificent. And I also enjoyed the ending credits. GLaDoS got sass. 11/10 would recommend.

Mechanically simple and yet a progressively robust puzzle loop. Accessible enough that anyone will be able to try, but challenging enough that only those determined to think outside the box will prevail. The level design and dialogue combine to create a memorable atmosphere. I (with no encouragement from Aperture Science Laboratories) have a hard time finding anything wrong with Portal. 10/10
Graphics are great and the story line is great.
